Could it be that Hrant has finally broken through to people with his alphabet reform?

Well, okay, maybe not . . . ;-)

They might have come up with more believable glyphs by trawling in one of these [old](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019095623/http:/www.typophile.com/battle09) [Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019095623/http:/typophile.com/node/16343) [threads](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019095623/http:/typophile.com/node/54055).  
(Of course I suppose that the goofier the glyphs, the more amusing one might take the story to be.)

I am just happy to see letterforms as the subject matter in The Onion.

ChrisL
